NOW HIRING! 2 IT Project Managers on Contract with a Leading Management Consulting firm working onsite at a client in downtown Phoenix, AZ. The PM will lead teams comprised of client personnel, vendors and sub-contractors.
Experience managing the deployment of operational infrastructure (telecommunications, networking, servers, storage, etc.). Message or emial (dvogt@pyramidcgi.com) me if interested! Degree Required.

DIRECT HIRE OPENING! My client is located in Scottsdale just south of Old Town. They are an excellent construction company with a ton of growth and upside. You can email me directly at dvogt@pyramidcgi.com if you are interested or know anyone who is!

The Project/Contracts Coordinator will assist the Contracts Administration team in the preparation, review, and administration of contractual proposals relating to construction projects. They will be overseeing and monitoring project contracting to insure contract activities are completed within prescribed schedules, and in compliance with company policies and procedures.
Director of Business Development and Recruiting

Pyramid Consulting Group is a technical staffing firm that specializes within the Engineering and IT fields placing consultants on contract, contract-to-hire and direct hire openings. Whether you are a prospective business partner or talented individual looking for a better career, we are interested in establishing a fully transparent, consultative and long term relationship with you. We understand our consultants and business partners time is extremely valuable. Therefore, we offer all of our business partners responsiveness, honesty, full transparency, consultative advice, best practices and a trustworthy recruitment expert to guide you. Here are a few of the most common skill sets we recruit for our clients. Please note we support many other technical positions:  Engineering: • Mechanical, Electrical, Structural, Civil Engineers • Designers/Drafters • Controls Engineers • Quality Engineers • Manufacturing/Process/Industrial Engineers  • Buyer/Planners • Production/Maintenance Supervisor • Technicians (Testing, Documentation, Electrical, Mechanical) • Solar, Utility, EPC IT: • Business and Systems Analysts • Technology Project Managers • Database Administrators and Developers • Web based Developers & Designers • Application Developers & Architects • Software Engineers • Business Intelligence and Data Warehouse Admin and Development • Middleware System Programmers • Mainframe Programmers • IT Management • Operations, Infrastructure and Help Desk SupportConstruction: • Project Engineers • Project Managers • Construction Managers • Superintendents • Skill Trades • Project Coordinators • Field Engineers • Solar, Utility, EPCdvogt@pyramidcgi.com248-318-3258
SpecialtiesFinance and Accounting - This includes: corporate finance, general accounting, tax, SOX compliance, treasury, internal audit, M&A, investment analysis and accounting, and much more.
SpecialtiesStaffing and Recruitment: Contract, Contract to Hire, Permanent Placement. Engineering Verticals: Manufacturing, Aerospace, Defense, Automotive, Electronics, Architectural.

Project Management I Program Management I Agile Scrum Master
July 9, 2016, Pamela Tudor (Solto) was a client of DJ’S

On a Friday afternoon in April 2016,  I applied for a Project Management position with a company named Pyramid Consulting.   At that time it never occurred to me that Pyramid was posting the job on behalf of their client nor did I expect to ever receive a call from them. Why would I, considering the fact that I had applied for over 60 jobs within a two month period of time with no results.  I must say that I was quite surprised to receive a phone call the following Monday morning from DJ.  DJ is by far one of the most professional recruiters with whom I have ever worked and that is the honest truth. Within two weeks of being contacted by DJ, I had a job offer.  What I like most about DJ and one of the reasons why I believe that I got the Project Management job was due to the excellent coaching that DJ provided to me.  He is truly a professional and most importantly,  he is a man of his word, definitely a trait that not all recruiters share.  I would highly recommend DJ to anyone who is looking for an honest, dedicated and detail oriented professional.
